item.description:
Walk from Mine Falls to downtown Nashua via the trails. I plan on stopping at the City Room Cafe for breakfast/brunch, then walk back.Â Approx. a round trip of 5 miles, should take about 1 hr down + 1/2 hr for brunch + 1 hr back = 2 1/2 hrs.

Thursday is supposed to be hot & humid, bring water and/or money to buy water in town for the walk back.

I'll be at the start at 9 am and leave at 9:15 sharp.
item.how_to_find_us: look for the Meetup sign on a black Subaru

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Mine Falls Walk to Brunch
